verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that came unto \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beeri|strong="H0882"\w*, in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

The \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of the \w word|strong="H1696"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Hosea|strong="H1954"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* unto thee a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* and \w children|strong="H3206"\w* of \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w*: for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* hath committed \w great|strong="H2181"\w* \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w*, \add departing\add* \w from|strong="H0310"\w* the

d*.

So he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Diblaim|strong="H1691"\w*; which \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*; for yet a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \add while\add*, and I will \w avenge|strong="H6485"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, and will cause to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft avenge: Heb. visit\f*

And it shall come to pass at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

¶ And she conceived \w again|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. And \add God\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* her \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*: for I will no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; but I will \w utterly|strong="H5375"\w* take them \w away|strong="H5375"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft Lo-ruhamah: that is, Not having obtained mercy\f*\f + \fr 1.6 \ft no…: Heb. not add any more to\f*\f + \fr 1.6 \ft but…: or, that I should altogether pardon them\f*

But I will have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and will not \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them by \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, nor by \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, nor by \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, by \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, nor by \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.
¶ Now when she had \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w Lo-ruhamah|strong="H3819"\w*, she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, and \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \add God\add*, \w Call|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Lo-ammi|strong="H3818"\w*: for ye \add are\add* not my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will not be your \add God\add*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft Lo-ammi: that is, Not my people\f*

¶ Yet the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, which cannot be \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* nor \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w*; and it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where it was \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye \add are\add* not my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add there\add* it shall be \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add Ye are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.\f + \fr 1.10 \ft in…: or, instead of that\f*

Then shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* themselves \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and they shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.
